title: Try not to stare directly at me for too long. . . .
body:
Otherwise you might miss what's going on behind me. . . .

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Gems_47170b_5349758_zpsggtfpplo.png

replies.body: The deadpan way Taric says Gems there gets me. It's just a flat Gems.
Can we talk about why Leona needs an umbrella to keep the sun off of her?
Even being the Aspect of the Sun doesn't stop you from getting sunburns. Otherwise, Leona would be much more of a bronze color.

But Nocturne can just walk around in the daylight.
Leona does NOT get sunburns
Exactly, because she takes proper precautions.
Sunburns are thing.
o.O this has changed my perspective on life
Stop making my brain hurt.
I thought {{champion:64}} was blind......
They still don't know.
He stared too long.
https://40.media.tumblr.com/484f43232c36b8ef9c7ac7aa12da0caa/tumblr_o3yw1639sM1vnh8f5o1_500.jpg
you, I like.
Well thank you!
Hmm..... Huh? Oh! Were we supposed to be looking at something other than Leona?

turn your head slightly left, and i think you'll see what the person wants you to.

sona.
No no... I think it's supposed to be Leona.
My eyes hurt , I was only staring at the sun  the whole time

Gems are truly outRapeous.
They are truly truly truly outRapeous
Funnyjunk master race.
God damn Sona's melons are hu.... I mean she has a great personality.
Gems. Gems indeed.
Now we know why Lee is blind
shiny leona boobies.
Why stare at Leona when Sona is right there?
Pool party {{champion:37}} confirmed?
I have $25 lined up now
